BrewComputerFrame - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
Swing frame control panel for brew computer
Created with netbeans editor, but 3 step panels are replaced by
dynamic panels

Creates new form BrewComputerFrame
BrewComputerMain - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
Main Class to start brew computer application
Developed for raspberry pi
needs connection from raspberry to brew board

brewRecipe - Static variable in class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewComputerMain
 
BrewRecipe - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
Brew recipe for beer
A BrewRecipe contains a list of BrewSteps
A BrewStep contains information about the step and a list of Ingredient
BrewRecipe(String, List<BrewStep>) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewRecipe
 
BrewRecipe(String, BrewStep) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewRecipe
 
BrewRecipe(String) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewRecipe
 
BrewStep - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
A BrewStep is an action in a BrewRecipe
It consists of temperature and duration and a list of all ingredients
which are put in in this step
BrewStep(String, List<Ingredient>, Integer, Boolean, Integer) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStep
 
BrewStep(String, Ingredient, Integer, Boolean, Integer) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStep
create BrewStep with only one ingredient
BrewStep(String, Integer, Boolean, Integer) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStep
create BrewStep without ingredient
BrewStep(String, Integer, Boolean) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStep
create BrewStep without ingredient and without temperatur
BrewStepKeyListner - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
Combined Listener Class for ReceipeFrame, part BrewSteps
The class implements ItemListner for text fields and
ActionListiner for buttons

BrewStepKeyListner(JComboBox, Integer, String, BrewRecipe) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStepKeyListner

buzzer - Static variable in class de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewComputerMain
 
Buzzer - Class in de.dirkgasser.brauen
Java class to handle a GPIO pin of Raspberry Pi as Buzzer
Pin is taken as Address, so column "wPI" of "GPIO readall" command
Buzzer beep makes five 300ms beeps
Buzzer(int) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.Buzzer
creator with ony PIN
Buzzer(int, GpioController) - Constructor for class de.dirkgasser.brauen.Buzzer
Creator which PIN and GpioFactory
